prompt: What is Prism AI?
response: Prism AI is an all-in-one AI SaaS platform offering article writing, blog title, image generation, background removal, and resume analysis tools

prompt: what features it offers?
response: Features includes article writing, blog title, image generation, background removal, resume analysis tools and more.

prompt: How do I sign up for Prism AI?
response: You can sign up using your Google account or email via our secure Clerk authentication system.

prompt: What is the price of Prism AI Premium?
response: Prism AI Premium costs $16 per month and provides unlimited access to all advanced features.

prompt: Which features are free in Prism AI?
response: Free users can access the Article Writer, Blog Title Generator, and the Document Converter.

prompt: What tools are locked behind the Premium plan?
response: Premium features include AI Image Generation, Background Removal, Object Removal, and the Resume Reviewer.

prompt: How many tools and features does Prism AI offer?
response: Prism AI offers 7+ core tools including Article Writer, Blog Title Generator, Image Generator, Background Remover, Object Remover, Resume Reviewer, and Document Converter.

prompt: What is the technology stack of Prism AI?
response: Prism AI is built using the PERN stack: PostgreSQL (Neon), Express.js, React, and Node.js.

prompt: How does the Article Writer work?
response: It uses advanced AI models to generate high-quality, SEO-optimized articles based on your specific topic and length requirements.

prompt: Can I generate blog titles for free?
response: Yes, the Blog Title Generator is one of the three tools available in our free tier.

prompt: How do I remove the background from an image?
response: Upload your photo to the Background Remover tool; our AI processes it via Cloudinary to provide a clean cutout.

prompt: What does the Object Remover do?
response: The Object Remover allows you to highlight unwanted items in a photo and uses AI to erase them and fill the background.

prompt: Is my resume data safe?
response: Yes, Prism AI uses Clerk for secure sessions and ensures your uploaded documents are private and encrypted.

prompt: How does the Resume Reviewer help?
response: It analyzes your resume structure, keywords, and layout to give you actionable feedback for job applications.

prompt: What is the Dashboard?
response: The Dashboard is your personal hub where you can track your creation history, credit usage, and subscription status.

prompt: Where can I see images created by other users?
response: You can explore the Community Section to see public images generated by the Prism AI community.

prompt: Can I make my generated images public?
response: Yes, when generating an image, check the 'Make Public' box to share it in the community gallery.

prompt: What payment system does Prism AI use?
response: We use Clerk Billing to manage secure payments and monthly $16 subscriptions.

prompt: How do I check my remaining free credits?
response: Your remaining credits are displayed on your Dashboard; they are tracked via Clerk's private metadata.

prompt: What happens when I run out of credits?
response: Once your free credits are exhausted, you will need to upgrade to the $16/month Premium plan to continue using the tools.

prompt: Can I cancel my subscription?
response: Yes, you can manage and cancel your Premium subscription anytime through the Billing tab in your settings.

prompt: Is Prism AI mobile friendly?
response: Yes, the application is fully responsive and works perfectly on smartphones and tablets.

prompt: How do I download my generated articles?
response: You can copy the text directly from the result area or use the download button provided in the tool.

prompt: Does the Document Converter support PDF?
response: Yes, the Document Converter allows you to process and convert PDF files into editable formats.

prompt: Where is my data stored?
response: We use Neon PostgreSQL, a serverless database, to store your prompts, activity logs, and content history safely.

prompt: Who is the Prism AI chatbot assistant?
response: I am your personal AI assistant, designed to help you navigate Prism AI and answer questions about our features.

prompt: Can I change the style of generated images?
response: Yes, you can select different styles like 3D, Realistic, or Artistic in the Image Generator tool.

prompt: How long does it take to generate an article?
response: Most articles are generated within 16 to 30 seconds depending on the length requested.

prompt: What image formats are supported for removal tools?
response: We support standard web formats including PNG, JPG, and JPEG.

prompt: How do I see my total number of creations?
response: The total count of everything you have created is featured at the top of your user Dashboard.

prompt: Is there a limit on premium usage?
response: Premium users enjoy significantly higher limits and priority processing for all AI features.

prompt: Can the AI write code?
response: While focused on articles and titles, you can use the Article Writer to generate technical content and code snippets.

prompt: How do I update my profile information?
response: You can manage your name, email, and password through the Clerk profile portal integrated into Prism AI.

prompt: What should I do if the image generator fails?
response: Ensure your prompt is descriptive and check if you have remaining credits or an active premium plan.

prompt: How does the navigation work?
response: The sidebar allows you to switch between tools, while the navbar handles your profile and dashboard access.

prompt: Can I use Prism AI for commercial use?
response: Yes, users on the Premium plan have full rights to use generated content for commercial purposes.

prompt: How do I reach support?
response: You can ask questions here in the chatbot or visit our contact page for more detailed technical help.

prompt: Does Prism AI save my image prompts?
response: Yes, your prompts are saved in the PostgreSQL database so you can revisit them in your Dashboard.

prompt: What is the '3D Style' option?
response: It is a specific setting in our Image Generator that produces depth-heavy, Pixar-like 3D visuals.

prompt: How do I delete my history?
response: You can manage and delete your past creations directly from the activity log in your Dashboard.

prompt: Does the background remover work on logos?
response: Yes, it is excellent for creating transparent PNG logos for websites and presentations.

prompt: How do I get better blog titles?
response: Provide 2-3 keywords related to your niche, and the AI will generate the most clickable title options.

prompt: Can I use the resume reviewer for CVs?
response: Yes, it supports both standard Resumes and academic CVs.

prompt: How does the credit system update?
response: After every successful generation, the backend updates your metadata in Clerk to reflect your new balance.

prompt: Is there a community for Prism AI?
response: Yes! The Community Section is a public space where users share their best AI-generated artwork.

prompt: How do I share my work on social media?
response: You can download your images or articles and share them directly to your favorite social platforms.

prompt: Does Prism AI use Cloudinary?
response: Yes, we use Cloudinary's powerful API for image hosting and AI-based image transformations.

prompt: What is the 'Outlet' in your code?
response: The 'Outlet' is a React Router component that renders the specific AI tool page you have selected.

prompt: Can I upgrade from free to premium at any time?
response: Absolutely! You can upgrade instantly via the billing section for just $16/month.

prompt: How do I know if I am a Premium user?
response: Your Dashboard will display a 'Premium' badge and you will have access to all locked tools like Object Removal.

prompt: How do I use the Document Converter?
response: Upload your file, select the output format, and click 'Convert' to process your document.

prompt: Can I suggest new features?
response: Yes! We love user feedback. Feel free to suggest new AI tools via our support channels.

prompt: Does the AI support multiple languages?
response: Currently, Prism AI is optimized for English, but it can process and generate content in many other languages.

prompt: What makes Prism AI unique?
response: Prism AI combines text, image, and document AI tools in a single $16 subscription, saving you money on multiple apps.

prompt: How do I copy my generated image URL?
response: Once generated, you can right-click the image to copy the link or use the 'Copy Link' button in the gallery.

prompt: How does the 'Like' system work?
response: You can like images in the Community Section, and the total 'Likes' are updated in our PostgreSQL database.

prompt: Is the backend secure?
response: Yes, our Node/Express backend uses environment variables and secure API calls to protect all data.

prompt: How do I log out?
response: Click on your profile icon in the navbar and select the 'Sign Out' option provided by Clerk.

prompt: Can I use the Article Writer for school?
response: Prism AI is a great brainstorming tool, but we recommend reviewing and editing all AI content for academic integrity.

prompt: Why is my dashboard empty?
response: If you haven't created anything yet, your dashboard will be empty. Try using the Article or Image tools!

prompt: How do I use the Object Remover?
response: Upload an image, use the brush tool to highlight the object you want to remove, and click 'Process'.

prompt: Does Prism AI have an API for developers?
response: Currently, Prism AI is a consumer SaaS, but we may release a public API in the future.

prompt: Where is Prism AI hosted?
response: The entire application, including the frontend and backend, is hosted on Vercel for maximum speed.

prompt: Can I generate high-resolution images?
response: Yes, our Premium Image Generator produces high-quality, high-resolution images suitable for web use.

prompt: How does the Blog Title Generator stay trendy?
response: Our AI is trained on high-performing headlines to ensure the titles generated are catchy and clickable.

prompt: Is there a limit on background removals?
response: Premium users have unlimited background removals per month.

prompt: What is Clerk?
response: Clerk is our authentication and user management provider that keeps your account and billing information secure.

prompt: What is Neon?
response: Neon is the serverless PostgreSQL database we use to store all your Prism AI data efficiently.

prompt: Can I use the tools on my phone?
response: Yes, all Prism AI features are optimized for mobile web browsers.

prompt: How do I get a refund for my subscription?
response: Please contact our support team to discuss refund eligibility as per our terms of service.

prompt: How do I see my billing history?
response: You can view all your past $16 payments within the 'Billing' section of your account settings.

prompt: Can I generate more than 3 articles for free?
response: The free plan is limited by credits. Once they are gone, you must upgrade to Premium to write more.

prompt: What is the benefit of the 'Public' image setting?
response: It allows you to get 'Likes' and feedback from the Prism AI community.

prompt: Can I use the resume reviewer for multiple resumes?
response: Yes, Premium users can upload and analyze as many resumes as they need.

prompt: How does Prism AI handle file uploads?
response: We use Multer to handle the file stream and upload it securely to Cloudinary.

prompt: Does the AI understand industry-specific jargon?
response: Yes, the Resume Reviewer and Article Writer are trained on a wide range of industry data.

prompt: How can I tell if a feature is Premium?
response: Premium features are marked with a 'Pro' or 'Lock' icon for free users.

prompt: Why is my text area empty after conversion?
response: Ensure you don't refresh the page manually. The AI takes a few seconds to populate the text area.

prompt: How do I reset my password?
response: You can reset your password through the 'Forgot Password' link on the Clerk sign-in page.

prompt: Can I use Prism AI for my business?
response: Yes, Prism AI is perfect for small businesses looking to automate content and image creation.

prompt: What is the response time for the chatbot?
response: I respond instantly to help you with any Prism AI queries!

prompt: Can I generate images without a prompt?
response: No, the AI needs a text description to know what you want to create.

prompt: Does Prism AI support dark mode?
response: Yes, the Prism AI interface is designed to be easy on the eyes with a modern professional theme.

prompt: What is the 'Article Length' option?
response: It allows you to tell the AI whether you want a short summary or a long-form detailed article.

prompt: How do I know if my subscription is active?
response: Your Dashboard will show your status as 'Active' or 'Premium' next to your user details.

prompt: Can I upload PDF files to the resume reviewer?
response: Yes, the Resume Reviewer supports PDF and standard document formats.

prompt: How do I use the sidebar?
response: Click any icon in the sidebar to instantly switch between different AI tools like 'Write Article' or 'Image Generator'.

prompt: What happens to my data if I delete my account?
response: Upon account deletion via Clerk, your personal data and history are removed from our database.

prompt: Does Prism AI use GPT-4?
response: We use a variety of high-performance LLMs to ensure the best results for each specific tool.

prompt: Can I generate social media captions?
response: Yes! Use the Article Writer or Blog Title tool to create engaging captions for Instagram, LinkedIn, or X.

prompt: What is the resolution of generated images?
response: Images are typically generated at 1624x1624 resolution for high clarity.

prompt: How do I report a bug?
response: You can report any technical issues to our support team via the contact form.

prompt: Can I change the email on my account?
response: Yes, you can update your email settings through the Profile section managed by Clerk.

prompt: How do I get a better resume score?
response: Follow the specific feedback provided by the Resume Reviewer, such as adding more quantifiable achievements.

prompt: Why did my article stop mid-way?
response: This can happen due to network issues. Try generating again; your credits are only deducted for successful runs.

prompt: Is Prism AI available in my country?
response: Prism AI is available globally wherever you have internet access and can use Clerk/Stripe for payments.

prompt: Can I use Prism AI for SEO research?
response: The Blog Title Generator is a great tool for finding high-ranking keywords for your niche.

prompt: How do I see the prompts used for community images?
response: Click on any image in the Community Section to view the prompt and style used to create it.

prompt: Can I turn off the chatbot?
response: The chatbot is always available in the corner to help you, but you can minimize it at any time.

prompt: How do I use the Document Converter?
response: Upload your document, click convert, and wait for the AI to process and display your new file.

prompt: Is there a community leaderboard?
response: We show the most 'Liked' images in the Community Section so you can see what's trending.

prompt: Does Prism AI have a browser extension?
response: Not yet! Prism AI is currently a web-based application.

prompt: How do I save an article?
response: You can copy the text and save it to your computer or view it later in your Dashboard history.

prompt: Can I use the background remover for product photos?
response: Yes, it is perfect for e-commerce sellers who need clean product images for their shops.

prompt: How does the Object Remover decide what to fill?
response: The AI looks at the surrounding pixels and 'imagines' what should be there, creating a seamless look.

prompt: Does Prism AI offer student discounts?
response: Our $16/month plan is already our most affordable 'everything-included' price for everyone.

prompt: Can I use the tools without an account?
response: No, you must create a free account to track your credits and save your work.

prompt: What is the backend base URL?
response: The backend is hosted on Vercel and communicates with the frontend via secure API endpoints.

prompt: How do I refresh my credit count?
response: The credit count refreshes automatically when you visit the Dashboard or upgrade to Premium.

prompt: Why are some images in the community section blurred?
response: This might be due to a slow connection; wait a few seconds for the high-resolution image to load.

prompt: How do I get help with a billing error?
response: Contact our support team with your Clerk transaction ID for fast assistance.

prompt: Can I generate images in portrait mode?
response: The current Image Generator defaults to square (1:1), which is best for social media and community viewing.

prompt: How do I add more detail to an article?
response: Use the 'Detailed' setting and provide a specific outline in your prompt.

prompt: Does the Resume Reviewer check for grammar?
response: Yes, it checks for spelling, grammar, and professional tone.

prompt: How do I see my recent activity?
response: Your 5 most recent creations are listed directly on your Dashboard for quick access.

prompt: What is the technology behind the Object Remover?
response: It uses Generative Inpainting technology to fill the space left by removed objects.

prompt: Can I change my UI to Light Mode?
response: Prism AI currently features a sleek 'Always Dark' or 'Professional' theme for better focus.

prompt: How do I use the Blog Title Generator?
response: Simply enter your blog topic and hit 'Generate' to see a list of creative titles.

prompt: Is the Document Converter fast?
response: Yes, most conversions happen in under 16 seconds.

prompt: How do I know if an image is public?
response: Public images will appear in the Community Section for all users to see.
